Smart Pillow: A pillow with built-in sensors and AI technology that can detect and monitor your sleep patterns, providing personalized recommendations for improved sleep quality.
Glowing Pillow: A pillow with a built-in LED light system that can be customized to create a soothing and relaxing ambiance in your bedroom.
Memory Foam Pillow with Personalized Scent: A pillow with a built-in scent diffuser that can release a personalized fragrance based on your preferences.
Pillow with Built-in White Noise Machine: A pillow with a built-in white noise machine that can help you fall asleep and stay asleep.
Pillow with Integrated Music Player: A pillow with a built-in music player
